In this exquisite miniature, made c.1415 in the French workshop of the Boucicaut Master, a bearded God crowned with the papal triple tiara, presents Eve to Adam. Paradise is enclosed by a circle of wattle fencing which contains some of the animals , including a unicorn. Angels lean over the fence to watch. But this image is also striking in showing the world outside the enclosing fence as full of creatures. They seem to have wandered out into the agreeable surrounding landscape which is watered by the water of life. Swans and fishes swim in the water, and chickens peck in the foreground.
